DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 / THE FIRST ROUND ; SPOTLIGHT ; JOURNALISTS AREN ' T
DOC.TEXT: By an overwhelming margin , the 2 # 310 journalists who participated in an Adidas survey selected Brazil to win the World Cup . In voting done before June 26 , nearly 70 % of the journalists felt Brazil would reach the final , and of those , 80 % predicted that the Brazilians would win . The runner-up was Germany , with 1 # 115 votes as a participant in the finals and 420 to finish as champion . Argentina and Italy finished third and fourth . Twenty-one journalists picked the United States to win the Cup .
